description: Application for prior notification of proposed demolition of electricity substation and ancillary structures (site also known as 'Lough Road Substation Site').
site_name: Land Rear Of Carronade Court And 62 - 64
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The demolition hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:

Bidwells Planning Support Statement May 2012, Parsons Brinckerhoff Demolition Report May 2012 (excluding Appendix C – PB Demolition Concept Drawings and Appendix F – Asbestos Report), Parsons Brinckerhoff Asbestos Survey August 2011, Parsons Brinckerhoff Demolition Noise and Vibration Assessment June 2011, Parsons Brinckerhoff Flood Risk Appraisal August 2011, Parsons Brinckerhoff Preliminary Ground Investigation Interpretative Report March 2011, Parsons Brinckerhoff Geotechnical Desk Study October 2010, UKPN Hazard Elimination and Management List April 2008, Parsons Brinckerhoff Site Waste Management Plan June 2011, ecoResponse Waste Classification document February 2012, letter from Kathryn Mallett (Bidwells) dated 20/06/2012.

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
